title: SMC_Orientation (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_Orientation : STRUCT
Represents an orientation with three euler angles
A, B, and C.  Which convention is used (XYZ, ZYZ, ZYX, â¦)
must be specified for each use of this structure and is not
part of the structure definition.

rows.Name: A
rows.Comment: The euler angle A in degrees.

rows.Name: B
rows.Comment: The euler angle B in degrees.

rows.Name: C
rows.Comment: The euler angle C in degrees.
